confirmByAdminText:
Hi {{name}},

A new user has requested access to the survey platform: {{usermail}}.

To confirm the user access, please click on the link below, or copy-paste the following URL {{userConfirmationUrl}}.

Thank you
confirmByUserText:
Hi {{name}},

You have requested access to the survey platform.

To confirm your access, please click on the link below, or copy-paste the following URL {{userConfirmationUrl}}.

Thank you
pendingConfirmByAdminSubject: Evolution platform: account creation confirmation pending
pendingConfirmByAdminText:
Hi {{name}},

your access request to the survey platform will be reviewed by an administrator shortly.

Thank you
resetPasswordEmailText:
Hi {{name}},

You are receiving this because you have requested the reset of the password for your account.

Please click on the following link, or paste this into your browser to complete the process

{{resetPasswordUrl}}

If you did not request this, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.

Thank you
magicLinkEmailText:
Welcome!

To connect to your questionnaire, click on the following link: {{magicLinkUrl}}.

Thank you
welcomeEmailText:
Hello,

You have requested access to this survey.

Thank you for your participation.
welcomeEmailSubject: Welcome to the survey [do not respond]
